channel.title: Change Xp Rate
channel.description: how do i change exp rate of Certain skills? example theiving, crafting and stuff. where do i change exp?

item.title: Change Xp Rate
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Client.java

but to change the XP rate totally depends on you’re source and the skill. Here’s an example taken from thieving which will be different to most of the other skills.

if(objectID == 2561){
if(playerLevel[17] >= 1){
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){
actionInterval = 4000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
addItem(995, 40000);
addSkillXP(300, 17);
setAnimation(881);
}
}
}

Clearly where it says addSkillXP is where you change the XP for thieving, but like I said yours can be completly different.

Read full topic
